alert.note: Alert for Iron; Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:24PM CDT until April 20 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN IRON AND NORTHEASTERN REYNOLDS COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Reynolds, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ironton, Pilot Knob, Arcadia, Glover, Roselle, Centerville, Hogan, Lesterville, Black, and Granite. This also includes Johnsons Shut-Ins State Park, Fort Davidson Historic Site, Elephant Rocks State Park, and Taum Sauk Mountain State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
